name: Avoid FOR loops which can be simplified to a WHILE loop (PHP)
description: This rule searches for all the Methods and Functions containing FOR loops which can be simplified and changed to WHILE loops.
output:
"This report lists all Methods and Functions with FOR loops which can be simplified and changed to WHILE loops.

This QR provides the following information:
Method and Function full name."
rationale: For performance reasons, WHILE loops are preferred to FOR loops.
remediation: Modify the source code to reduce the number of FOR loops which can be simplified to WHILE loops.
remediationSample:
<?php
class CastTest
 {
     public function test($x)
     {
         while (true) true;  // the violation is corrected
     }
 }
?>
sample:
<?php
 class CastTest
 {
     public function test($x)
     {
         for (;true;) true; // VIOLATION : there is no init or update part so it can be as well be: while (true)
     }
 }
?>
